text: The Devil to Pay is a 1920 American silent mystery film directed by Ernest C. Warde and starring Roy Stewart, Robert McKim and Fritzi Brunette.Goble p.736 ==Cast== * Roy Stewart as Cullen Grant * Robert McKim as Brent Warren * Fritzi Brunette as Dare Keeling * George Fisher as Larry Keeling * Evelyn Selbie as Mrs. Roan * Joseph J. Dowling as George Roan * [Richard Lapan as Dick Roan * Mark Fenton as Dr. Jernigan * William Marion as Detective Potter ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 mystery films Category:American films Category:American mystery films Category:Films directed by Ernest C. Warde Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Devil to Pay (1920 film)
